content:
"How Humans Judge Machines" is a peer-reviewed book comparing peopleâ€™s reactions to human and machine actions. Through dozens of experiments, it brings us closer to understanding when people judge humans and machines differently, and why.

The PDF can be downloaded for free here:
https://www.judgingmachines.com

On behalf of Maarten de Rijke, University of Amsterdam

How Humans Judge Machines
A short summary of the main findings.
